Some days it's easy to be angry at the world. 
I'm having one of those days. 

My poor daughter is going on day 6 of vomiting and not being able to keep much down. COVID-19 for our two-year-old has not been fun. We are now trying to keep her hydrated - not easy. I'm defeated.

When we look at the WR draft class, there is plenty of value. The class is deep & there are 5 WRs I consider first-rounders. 

That said, the top-end talent is not anywhere close to last year with Chase & Waddle.

This is good for #DaBears who don't have a 1st-round pick though.
